name: H4ck0rz
description:
Hello H4ck0rz!

Can you unscramble these anagrams on level 1, 2, 3 and 4
Level 1 is about Premier League football teams
Level 2 is about video games
Level 3 is about outer space
Level 4 is about impossibiru football teams

Tip - Type "Hints" at the main menu to see a list of commands available (these are easter eggs)
